jd_information.description: Job Description –1. Candidate shall be receiving tour package requirement from clients through phone, mails, web query, walk ins.2. Candidate shall be working on client tour package requirement and purpose the best possible plan as per client’s requirement and budget.3. Candidate shall follow a client and convert the enquiry into sales.4. Candidate shall be confirming all booking with respective hotels, transporters and other vendors.5. Candidate shall be sending the complete tour kit and other relative documents and close file.6. Candidate would be in sales. Should have sound knowledge of domestic destinations.
